message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you get a decent chunk.  Accept this and we both win!
I think a more even split is fairer.  Let's both walk away with a good amount, and we can avoid any further losses from inflation.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a larger share to make this worthwhile. Let's split it 60/40 and end this before inflation eats away at our gains.
